name: Don't be late (hinatoy)
description:
You need to find a door key to leave the apartment in time.  Move from room to room, interact with cute characters and collect all sorts of stuff! 

Game features:

  • Click to collect, move, remove, place and interact with objects
  • Solve simple puzzles
  • Cute pets!

You can also try to challenge yourself and finish the game in less than 7 minutes in the hard level. 

I hope you have fun playing this short silly little game!
